column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////One little hiccup was that I ordered the Japanese Flight
column2: but one of the three whiskeys was completely out
column3: and another one couldn't even get a full pour out of it. So
column4: I really only had bout 1 1/3 out of 3 whiskeys on the flight. Thankfully
column5: that was comped on our bill.
